subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After Florida's Miguel Cabrera intentionally swung during what was supposed to be an intentional walk, it looked on video replays as if an unintentional smile flashed across his face when he made contact and sent the ball into center field.
snippet: After Florida's Miguel Cabrera intentionally swung during what was supposed to be an intentional walk, it looked on video replays as if an unintentional smile flashed across his face when he made contact and sent the ball into center field.
